author: Dhiraj Goel and Dhruv Batra
title: Predicting User Preference for Movies using NetFlix database
venue: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering Carnegie Mellon University
window: This work deals with one such problem, namely, that of predicting user preference for movies using the Netflix database. We present a memory-based Collaborative Filtering (CF) algorithm that learns the personality traits of the users in a features space we call the Latent Genre Space (LGS).
